Text: 10k seeders and 1 comment lol, anyway thanks again VTV we are all very aprecitive of your hard work.

Thanks for the episode. :)

Perhaps the reason there are not many comments is because it is a major pita to register. The captchas are near impossible to read and I got errors 5-6 times due to  a too long username, then it said my email was already in use yet when I tried to send for my username it said that email was not in the system. It took me about 15 minutes to finally register. If I didn't want to type this out so much I would have given up as I am sure many have. Oddly, the download was finished long before the registration was complete. lol
